IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Attachments: -Fraudulent checks -Suspect ID card Victim: - Brandywine Ops, LLC (Brandywine Xscape Theatres 7710 Matapeake Business Dr Brandywine, Maryland Witness: - Steven R. Wilson, Chief Legal Officer / General Counsel of Patoka Capital Suspect: - Davon Corey Chapman 1/M DOB 5/8/2004 309 Carmody Hills Dr Capital Heights, Maryland 20743 Scene Processing: -Subpoena Narrative: -On 2/2/2023 Steven R. Wilson, Chief Legal Officer / General Counsel of Patoka Capital, who is over Brandywine Ops, LLC (Brandywine Xscape Theatres) contacted the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division-Central South investigators regarding a theft/check fraud. Wilson advised the following, a total of five (5) checks were deposited and cleared for the amount of $998.10 each and dated 1/15/2023. On 1/28/2023, there was a sixth check attempted to be deposited before it was employee of Brandywine Ops, LLC (Brandywine Xscape Theatres). On 9/15/2022 a bonus check was provided to Chapman. Shortly after, Chapman did not show up to work and has since been back. It is believed Chapman used the information of the bonus check to duplicate the additional checks. Wilson provided investigators with Chapmans photo identification card on file. The following checks were deposited and cleared via Navy Federal Credit Union and provided to investigators: -Check #17970 for $998.10 -Check #17971 for $998.10 -Check #17972 for $998.10 -Check #17973 for $998.10 -Check #17974 for $998.10 Total of $4990.50 All the above checks were deposited at the Rockville, Montgomery County, branch, 12244 Rockville Pike, Rockville, Maryland 20852. Each check has an endorsement signature of same name, Davon Chapman, and dated 2/23/22. According the deposit stamp, each check was deposited on 1/23/2023 at approximately 1207 hours. The above checks were deposited without Brandywine Ops, LLC (Brandywine Xscape Theatres) authorization and consent. A subpoena was authored and submitted to Navy Federal Credit Union for further investigation. Case open for further investigation. All events occurred in Prince Georges County, Maryland.

Attachments: -Fraudulent checks -Suspect ID card Victim: - Brandywine Ops, LLC (Brandywine Xscape Theatres 7710 Matapeake Business Dr Brandywine, Maryland Witness: - Steven R. Wilson, Chief Legal Officer / General Counsel of Patoka Capital Suspect: - Davon Corey Chapman1/M DOB 5/8/2004 309 Carmody Hills Dr Capitol Heights, Maryland 240-462-5837 Scene Processing: -Subpoena Narrative: -On 2/27/2023, Navy Federal Credit Union (NFCU) responded to the subpoena and provided bank account information, customer information, and ATM video footage. The fraudulent checks deposited went into bank account number 8535272. According to NFCU, this account is under Chapmans name, which opened in March 2015. Due to Chapmans age at the time the account opened, Chapmans mother was required to sign as his parent. NFCU has Chapmans information with the date of birth of 5/8/2004 and address of 309 Carmody Hills Dr in Capitol Heights, Maryland. In addition, there is a listed telephone number of 240-462-5837 and email of CHAPMANDAVON48@GMAIL.COM The bank statements provided by NFCU shows the deposits of the fraudulent checks on 1/23/2023 and a withdrawal of $223.50 at a Lanham, Maryland ATM. The deposited checks were conducted via the Rockville Branch outdoor ATM, which NFCU provided footage. In the footage, there is a black male approaching the ATM and depositing the fraudulent checks. The black male appears to be Chapman. After comparing the video footage and the Maryland Identification Card photograph, the black male at the ATM has been positively identified as Chapman. Screenshots were shared with Kary Holt, HR Manager and Scott Bagwell, Theatre VP, who are familiar with Chapman while he was employed by Xscape Theaters. Holt and Bagwell were able to confirm and positively identify the subject in the footage as Chapman. Investigators will be applying for charges in Prince Georges County for Chapman and attempt to conduct an interview with him. Case open for further investigation. All events occurred in Prince Georges County, Maryland.

Attachments: -N/A Victim: - Brandywine Ops, LLC (Brandywine Xscape Theatres 7710 Matapeake Business Dr Brandywine, Maryland Witness: - Steven R. Wilson, Chief Legal Officer / General Counsel of Patoka Capital Suspect: - Davon Corey Chapman1/M DOB 5/8/2004 309 Carmody Hills Dr Capitol Heights, Maryland 240-462-5837 Scene Processing: -Criminal Summons Narrative: -On 3/28/2023, investigators applied for charges at the Prince Georges County Hyattsville Commissioners Office who issued a Criminal Summons for: Theft $1,500 to under $25,000. Criminal Summons was issued to Chapman. All events occurred in Prince Georges County, Maryland. Case closed by arrest.
